The protein produced from this gene helps determine the coloring (pigmentation) of the skin, hair, and eyes.",GHR,Angelman syndrome
Is Angelman syndrome inherited ?,"Most cases of Angelman syndrome are not inherited, particularly those caused by a deletion in the maternal chromosome 15 or by paternal uniparental disomy. These genetic changes occur as random events during the formation of reproductive cells (eggs and sperm) or in early embryonic development. Affected people typically have no his
